ASIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY AND EDUCATION | THE TRUE MEANING OF LOGO

STAR

Stands for excellence that AITE is committed to promote and achieve. AITE shall continuously develop its students in order for them to SHINE in their chosen fields.

TORCH

signifies that AITE will provide education and hope to those who dream. The flame represents the passionate desire of the stakeholders not just to excel but to be significant.

FLAME MOVES AND FORMS A GLOBE

Which means that AITE’s passion to educate, achieve, and excel shall affect others to do the same. It will develop high caliber professionals and skilled workers ready for global challenges.

LEAVES

The crown woven from bay leaves connotes victory and honor. The color progression from green to yellow gold expresses the development stages of the students, from infancy to maturity.

AITE

Is placed at the center because it is the prime mover of quality education and center of excellence. It will take part not just in the training of the intellect but the refinement of the heart.

PURPLE/VIOLET

The color purple is associated with ambition, art, beauty, creativity, inspiration, intelligence, knowledge, justice, leadership, pride, responsibility, spirituality, truth.

GREEN

Green represents efficiency, faith, fertility, freedom, growth, hope, life, progress, prosperity, reproduction, wisdom, youth.

YELLOW

stands for brightness, confidence, energy, innovation, happiness, idealism, optimism, power, patriotism, passion, excellence.

Tiaong Quezon's Pride!

Happy Happy Birthday to Olinsterg College and AITE's very own...... The TV Head Producer of Wowowin.... Sir Adrian Gret.

Asian Institute of Technology and Education Senior High School Department organized its 1st Leadership Training Seminar.

The LTS encompasses different lectures, forums, fellowship and team building activities.

Pagdiriwang ng Buwan ng Wika ng mga Kolehiyo ng AITE at Olinsterg College!

Nagdiwang ang mga mag-aaral ng Kolehiyo sa pamamagitan ng isang debate na tumutukoy sa mga kritikal na isyu sa ating bansa ngayon. Ang pagdiriwang ay nalapatan din ng pang-sining na patimpalak tulad ng Awitan at “Spoken Word Poetry.”
